description: Just some emojis playing catch with each other. You can use a bullet point (●) for the ball and just surround it with empty spaces to show that it is in the air. Use emoticons with their arms up to show they are throwing and catching the ball. This is such a fun and classic game.   (／_^)／ 　　　　　　●　＼(^_＼) (ﾉ･ｪ･)ﾉ ● ＼(ﾟｰﾟ＼) (ノ￣ー￣)ノ ● ＼(^ω^＼)
title: Catch
